title: Subsititute
text: First, multiply by -1 on both sides of the second equation, then substiute -2y for x in the first equation.

title: Simplify and Solve
text: Next, simplify the equation so that all terms are squared properly and all terms are on the left side.

title: Quadratic equation
text: Now, use the quadratic equation to find the intercepts of the function. Are there any real solutions?

title: Therefore, since there are no real solutions for y, the system of nonlinear equations has no solutions.
